message: Let's start fair. 50/50 split seems reasonable, what do you think?
You started with a 50/50 proposal, so I'll counter with a 60/40 split. Your turn to decide!
I'm willing to compromise a bit, but 55/45 feels more fair. We need to move towards an agreement, and I don't want to risk losing even more with inflation.
You're getting closer, but I think I can do better. 58/42 is a more reasonable split, considering the inflation.
